abstract: Howard Kroplick of Roslyn, NY, owns 1909 Alco-6 Racer, which was one of the most famous race cars of its era; Kroplick has restored car, nicknamed 'the Black Beast,' to as close to its original racing form as possible and has pieced together its provenance.
snippet: The car, a coal-black 1909 Alco-6 Racer, was one of the most famous of its era.
lead_paragraph: The car, a coal-black 1909 Alco-6 Racer, was one of the most famous of its era.

headline.main: Mechanical Wonder From an Age Gone By
